text: According to the story, Chrissy Metz needed to lube up her latex dress when she attended the MTV Movie Awards last year. The NBC star was presenting an award to Hugh Jackman for his work on Logan. However, as she laid out in her remarks, the lube became a bit of a problem when they were on-camera, and she had to lean over and tell him that there was a risk of some of the lube actually getting onto his suit. Hugh Jackman was obviously taken aback by the whole ordeal (as many of us likely would be), but it generally sounds like his suit was not ruined by the lube.
title: Chrissy Metz Almost Got Lube On Hugh Jackman's Suit At The MTV Movie Awards

meta_data.description: This Is Us star Chrissy Metz has opened up to talk about a wardrobe malfunction involving Hugh Jackman, some lube, and the MTV Movie Awards.
